name: Try Again (BlackMambaJesus)
description:
Try Again is a puzzle platformer in the spirit of Trap Adventure 2. You play as Jerome Block, a recently released thief who is trying to steal medicine from pharmaCO to save his estranged daughter's life. However, it is not out of parental love. Jerome only wants to learn the location of his ill gotten gains that were hidden by his ex-wife before her passing.

You will run, jump, and shoot your way through pharmaCO's wicked warehouse to reach your goal.

7 exciting levels to play!!!

Made Using
  • Godot 3.1
  • LMMS (Music)
  • Audacity (Sound Editing)
  • Inkscape (Art)
  • Paint.net  (Art)

Main game music and art created by myself.

Font from DaFont.com

Health pickup and gun shot sound are from freesound.org
